name: gp-connect-prescriptions-management-fhir
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/gp-connect-prescriptions-management-fhir.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/gp-connect-prescriptions-management-fhir.json
